comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Think about it, America.  WHY did it take so many years for women to have the right to vote?  WHY?  Does anyone today think that women should not be able to vote?  HOW STUPID IS THAT?  Women are human beings, they work and pay taxes, etc....so, WHY were they prevented from voting for so many years?  Think about it.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
